mil6.2.4:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil6.2.4:1.1_0: “The Realized Ones are seen, heard, thought, or known; in the world have fully awakened Buddha; there are disciples of mine who are ruined with gold, silver, or quaility; in the world have many different results, where they’re free of vanity.
mil6.2.4:1.2_0: That’s what I don’t want to talk about.”
mil6.2.4:2.1_0: “Great king, there are no three in the world.
mil6.2.4:2.3_0: If there’s no Individuation there’s no gratification in choices, and the next world, there’s no afterlife.”
mil6.2.4:2.4_0: “It’s good, Sir, that you should repeat what I have said.”
